package.name: goto_datamatrix
package.description: This node is a listener for the datamatrix transformation with respect to the frame of the move it planner (base_footprint) and publishes on the /goal_end_effector_pose topic to move the arm to that position using move it. an offset on z may be added for safety reasons since datamatrix pattern is a flat sheet of paper and gripper may collide with the floor if this z offset is not added.
